leading-none.description: Used for buttons, input fields etc.

leading-tight.description: Used for display and large titles

leading-normal.description: Used for body copy and smaller titles

vertical-primary-800|60-primary-800|75.description: Used in sd-media-teaser, sd-flipcard (gradient dark bottom)

vertical-transparent-white|80-white.description: Used in sd-scrollable (masking for top button)

vertical-white-white|80-transparent.description: Used in sd-scrollable (masking for bottom button)

fast.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

medium.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

slow.description:
Component State
Animation of states like hover or pressed
Microinteractions
Smooth transitions eg. for buttons or dropdowns

x-slow.description:
Page and component transitions
Transitions between screens, building animations for bigger components. (eg. image-text, super-teaser)

success.description: Used for success messages, valid states

error.description: Used for error messages, invalid states

error-400.description: Used for hover interaction invalid form elements

primary-400.description: Used for inverted pressed interaction in text link

primary.description: Used for buttons, select field, focus state

neutral-400.description:
Default border color. 
Used for divider, teaser, container, table cell, ...

neutral-800.description: Used for form fields, switch, radio, checkbox

error-400.description: Used for hover interaction invalid form elements

null.description:
Used to add border that is only visible in dark mode:
-dropdown

white.description: Used for buttons, inverted focus state

primary.description:
Inverted background color (light mode)
Used for button

white-alternative.description:
Used when element changes to primary in dark mode:
-Header

primary-200.description: Additional background color (dark mode) on primary-750

error-400.description: Used for hover interaction invalid form elements

primary-alternative.description: Used for background that remains the same in darkmode

primary-800-alternative.description: Used for background elevated in inverted (i.e.:footnote target)

black-alternative.description: Default text color in light mode and unchanged in dark mode

primary-200.description: Used for inverted hover interaction text link and inverted pressed interaction button label

primary-400.description:
Additional text inverted color
Used for inverted pressed interaction text link

neutral-700.description: Additional text color, Breadcrumb item current (dark mode)

success.description: Used to display positive performance values

error.description: Used to display negative performance values

white-alternative.description: Inverted text color (on dark background) and unchanged in dark mode

accent.description: Used for inverted hover interaction button label

primary-100.description: Used for inverted hover interaction button label

primary.description: Used for buttons, select field, focus state

primary-100.description: Used for inverted hover interaction button label

primary-200.description: Used for inverted hover interaction text link and inverted pressed interaction button label
